column4: :/ it looks like SystemParadox left, so can anyone else help with ssh being slow?
that's realy just a networking issue. means your down/up speed off of your server or your home connection needs work.
it's not, I tried in putty (windows) and the connection is very fast.
something is wrong with my ubuntu client.
I'd suggest moving your sshd port to something weird. keeps people from trying to brute-force
